Body:
cmd = "%s -i %s %s -d '|' -o %s -c 0" % (os.path.join(script_dir,
    'gristle_freaker'), self.easy_fqfn, self.easy_fqfn, self.out_fqfn)
runner = subprocess.Popen(cmd, stdin=subprocess.PIPE, stdout=subprocess.
    PIPE, close_fds=True, shell=True)
output = cleaner(runner.communicate()[0])
pp(output)
out_recs = []
for rec in fileinput.input(self.out_fqfn):
    out_recs.append(rec)
fileinput.close()
runner.stdin.close()
pp(out_recs)
assert runner.returncode == 0
assert len(out_recs) == 100
